text: The Sacramento Valley is the area of the Central Valley of the U.S. state of California. It lies north of the Sacramentoâ€“San Joaquin River Delta and is drained by the Sacramento River. It is made up of all or parts of ten Northern California counties. Although many areas of the Sacramento Valley are rural, it has several urban areas, including the state capital, Sacramento. ==References== Category:Valleys of California Category:Butte County, California Category:Colusa County, California Category:Glenn County, California Category:Placer County, California Category:Sacramento County, California Category:Shasta County, California Category:Sutter County, California Category:Tehama County, California Category:Yolo County, California Category:Yuba County, California Category:Central Valley of California
title: Sacramento Valley
